item.title: Podman
item.description: 概述 alias docker=podman podman 与 cri-o 同属 libpod 项目，https://github.com/containers/podman 项目地址：https://github.com/containers/libpod podman 命令行工具 podman [OPTIONS] COMMAND OPTIONS COMMAND attach Attach to a running container build Build an image using instructions from Dockerfiles commit Create new image based on the changed container container Manage Containers cp Copy files/folders between a container and the local filesystem create Create but do not start a container diff Inspect changes on container’s file systems events Show podman events
